column4: anyone know hwo to get the Veoh web player working in ubuntu?
it even in Windows didn't work correctly for me. :)
it works fine for me, now tell me how to get it workign in ubuntu pls
can't, never tried to run it in linux, I just installed minitube, xVideoServiceThief and Miro in it.
I could only suggest VirtualBox with some windows installed, if it doesn't work in Wine.
so you figured how to watch stream veoh movies in linux? can you tell me how?
so you figured how to watch stream veoh movies in linux? can you tell me how?

not really, except for the hard way for now, I just browse with proxy (squid) and monitor connections with squidview, and, when I see some big video file starts loading, I copy the url and use it in wget to download it.
ok, can u pls get nme the movie 'kiki's delivery service' and 'howl's moving castle' using that method and send to me? thanks
I don't really have time for it now, just install squid and squidview and do it yourself or install veoh in VirtualBox or Wine.
i only have 1 gig ram, can i install virtual box with that?
WinXP can work with 128Mb (mimimum), although, I got it to work even with 64Mb of ram. Yes, Gig is enough.
im trying to start virtual box but it's asking for windowsxp cdrom, what do i do
VirtualBox is a Program emulating a real computer, You have to insert some Windows CD/DVD to install it inside of it. Windows will think that it's running on a real computer.
can i just get a windows xp iso or something from the internet?
I cannot advise you this, since it's a piracy, but you can use any win xp cd or iso
did you try to run it with wine?
